column3: Sport;Cambodia booked their spot in the semifinals of the AFF U-22 Championship with a 2-0 victory over Myanmar.------A goal in the 16th minute was followed by a saved penalty 19 minutes later.------The clincher came in the 51st
column4: giving Felix Dalmas’side the second victory in the tournament.  ------ Thailand and Vietnam have both gone through to the last 4 from Group A
column6: Indonesia and Myanmar all having a chance from Group B.
